channel.title: Line Rider Challenge
channel.description:
I hereby put forth a challenge to all competant MITB people.
[b]The game[/b]: Line Rider [b]The challenge[/b]: Make a non-sucky track [b]The site[/b]: http://www.linerider.com/play.html
You have 48 hours to make the best, most smooth, most sexy, most longly piece of track you can. When you have finished your tracks, record them, and upload to youtube.com, then post the link in this thread.
On Friday, my time (48 hours from now ;) ) I will make this thread into a poll so everyone votes. Winner gets...hmm. Oh! I know! Winner gets like...100k on RS, k? If you don't like/play RS and you win, you get nothing. K?
K. Go!
